Author: skablast
Title: [ANN] Vesa.io – Crypto copy trading for digital asset exchanges
Body: Well, there is a lot of things that are free, but the experience is different if you pay. Spotify in my country is an example. You can listen to music, but not all of it in a way that you like.  Remaining on the investment, if everybody could copy, then probably they aren't the best trades available.  It all depends  on how good the traders are.  The same is mining: if you catch a good coin with a low difficult you can make a reasonable more money than mining ethereum.  However if a lot of people does the same, the difficult grow up immediately.  So, the average miner is looking at whattomine, to decide what to mine next, people in the known, receive info on new coin, or new contract win by XYZ coin, and mine that.  Then you can choose, you can go free with whattomine, I will be happy to give spend 1% to receive valuable info. Like I am happy to pay developer fee for the miner, even if there are alternative free that "almost" reach the same level

Author: marcolopes
Title: [ANN] Vesa.io – Crypto copy trading for digital asset exchanges
Body: Well, eTORO is a very respectable and established trading platform... so that is a plus for investors. Then again is all about quality of the traders...  The spotify example is not a good one, because i use it everyday since it came out (FREE version) and i'm perfectly more than satisfied with all that it gives to me.  eToro COPY TRADING HAS fees or at least a HEAVY SPREAD over the market price that can go up to 5%!!! https://www.etoro.com/customer-service/market-hours-fees/?category=crypto-currencies

Title: [ANN] Vesa.io – Crypto copy trading for digital asset exchanges
Body: So, why should you choose Vesa?  It is basically the only project that works with any cryptocurrency exchanges, offering trade in over 100 currency pairs. The demand for project tokens depends on the number of regular users, because VSA tokens are used for investors' paying out commissions to traders. At the last moment before pre-sale we start to looking who can help us with smart contract. We find Vadym. He create for us smart contract and we put him to our website. Thank you and other people for that. We did not do anything bad to you guys. But we stay strong and work on project more.

Author: Awallon
Title: [ANN] Vesa.io – Crypto copy trading for digital asset exchanges
Body: I'm not the creator of the project. If you have some questions to the team please contact vlad@vesa.io    VESA.io White paper  |  Facebook  |  Telegram  |  Twitter    Vesa is a fintech startup that allows newbie investors effectively earn on cryptocurrency rates. By means of the project, investors can automatically repeat the chosen trader's actions on the exchange, paying them a small commission. Instead of chaotic first steps on the market, investors follow a proven trading strategy of an experienced trader. And traders get an additional income for their trading talents. As a result, it gets easier and safer for new investors to enter the cryptocurrency market, which has a positive effect on cryptocurrency capitalization and popularity.    The copy trading feature is currently being used on the stock market. Some brokers offer copy trading with a limited number of cryptocurrencies. Vesa connects to different cryptocurrency exchanges (Bittrex, Poloniex, Bitfinex, etc.) via API and lets you copy transactions with hundreds of various cryptocurrencies directly from your exchange account. Vesa is a sort of a superstructure over cryptocurrency exchanges, which makes bidding easier. For instance, the investor can work on Poloniex and copy the trader's actions from their Bittrex account. Besides, the project technically has no access to money on both investors' and traders' exchange accounts. It only gives the information on copying. Traders, for their part, don't have access to investors' accounts. In addition, the investor can stop copy trading anytime. This makes the project completely safe and manageable.    Trader catalogue Vesa analyzes traders' history and creates the rankings according to their success, which is updated in real time. Thus, the investor can choose a trader from the catalogue judging by their objective results.  Investment portfolio Investors can trust different traders with their copy trading money and manage them by means of this facility.  Trading statistics Investment results can be analyzed by vivid statistics that will come in useful both for investors and traders.    Vesa is currently at the stage of a Pre-alpha version. Web Version  |    |      Vesa is a VSA token based on the ERC20 standard. It is integrated in the project infrastructure. In order to pay the trader a commission, the investor will buy VSA for fiat money in the personal account on Vesa.io. Having got tokens, the trader will be able either to keep them as an investment or exchange it freely for other cryptocurrency on the exchange. 40,000,000 VSA already issued. Additional issue - technically impossible. In order to guarantee VSA growth, a part of money received from ICO will be used for setting up the reserve fund. Besides, a part of VSA received from commission payment will be burnt. More in White Paper.    Pre sale IS LIVE, 3% 27.03-27.04 Public sale, 63% 27.04-27.05    Go to a separate topic about bounty here
